summary:
- Mentored a team of 12 successfully onboarding 6 projects taking them through architecture review and automation due diligence phases.
- SPOC for L4 non-functional support across application, network, infrastructure and Deployment disciplines.
- Rolled out templatized application configuration management with property abstraction reducing deployment issues by 65 percent.
- Increased resiliency by implementing end-to-end functional health check with synthetic testing enabled.
- Implemented requirements traceability matrix with azure boards/Teams bringing down change propagation workflow timeline by 20 percent.
- Designed and implemented database delta propagation workflows with Redgate.
- Mentored Openstack deployment and containerizing IBM datapower saving 1.2M per annum.
- Designed Azure environments for payments as a service. Onboarding in progress

- Built and mentored a team of 8 associates working across 15 devops tools.
- Migration of deployments from Thoughtworks GO to Jenkins.
- L4 level support for escalations and performance.
- Redesigned change propagation process and merged redundant tools bringing down administration effort by a third.

- Built and mentored a team of 6 across three teams for Due diligence.
- Designed reusable artifact templates by abstracting generic use cases across 3 teams.

- Built and mentored a team for 7 different project streams and successfully completed transition.
- Designed and implemented node classification schematics in puppet for enterprise data center
- Implemented client-based automation for accelerating efficiency and value generation.

- Designed and implemented Unit based pricing model for Build and deployment Management solutions.
- Optimized delivery model with reusable knowledge banks
- Average proposal success ratio of 35% for across small and medium proposals. 
- Created and published whitepaper on docker enablement in enterprises
- Pioneered CD principles and best practices knowledge bank for 400+ resources.

- Mined and migrated an enterprise application from WAS/Ant to Jboss/Maven.
- Administered and managed SCM tool ecosystem.
- Implemented Requirements traceability matrix with custom built hook scripts

- Implemented CI workflow for embedded systems with Jtag burn support
- Proposed and propagated end to end change management process with touchpoints to Bugzilla.
- Implemented metrics engine on Defect metrics.

- Performance tuned the world’s largest instance of Jira bringing down license cost by 50%
- Implemented Perl scripts to migrate from ClearQuest to Jira.
- Designed and implemented Defect tracking/Change Management workflows for over 200 projects.

- Build and deployment management across a polyglot stack. 
- Version control administration, backup and recovery implementation.
